node.title: Two teenage girls accused of plotting to kill teacher at Perth high school
node.alt: A police car outside a school
node.description: Detectives in Western Australia chargeÂ two teenage girls with attempting to kill a teacher who was stabbed at Willetton Senior High School yesterday.
node.content: ["Detectives in Western Australia have charged two teenage girls with attempting to kill a teacher at a Perth high school.", "Willetton Senior High School, in suburban Perth, was briefly locked down yesterday after a female teacher was stabbed, allegedly\u00a0by a 14-year-year-old girl.", "Police said the teenager ran from the school but was arrested nearby several hours later and charged overnight.", "A 13-year-old girl who is accused of providing the knife was arrested earlier yesterday and was also charged overnight.", "It is alleged the pair had been chatting online since\u00a0October 14 about plans to kill the teacher.", "The alleged attack happened at 11:10am and police said the teacher suffered a 1-centimetre\u00a0wound in the area of her left armpit.", "She was taken to Fiona Stanley Hospital and has since been discharged.", "The 13-year-old girl was arrested after police arrived at the school and a search for 14-year-old began immediately.", "Police said the girl was found about 6:50pm on foot in Willetton.", "Both teens are due to appear before Perth Children's Court today."]
